Move consumers from deprecated finatra-experimental/thrift to finatra/thrift Finatra thrift support has been promoted to main-line open-source finatra. Code in finatra-experimental is now deprecated and should not be used (it will be removed subsequently). This change moves customers away from deprecated finatra-experimental/thrift and to finatra/thrift.

Rename finatra/logback to finatra/slf4j and remove the logback dependency. Problem: finatra/logback included slf4j bridges and MDC utilities as well as a dependency on logback. This means that projects that want to use the slf4j bridge or MDC utilities were forced into taking logback as their logging implementation.

Allow a "client filter chain" to be specified when configuring thrift clients with ThriftClientModule. By creating a filter chain around thrift client method call, we can apply retries, timeouts, and other filters after Scrooge has decoded the service's response. Notably, we are now able to retry "application level" exceptions which cannot currently be retried at the Finagle level.
Deprecate HttpAssertions in favor of HttpWarmup. Update HttpClient to use RequestBuilder.

Finatra general improvements. * Add json tests for parsing numbers into booleans * Add README section documenting per controller filters * Allow configuring RichHttp(aggregateChunks) setting when creating HTTP server * Refactor HttpClient * Improve EmbeddedHttpServer output * Remove 404 response body for routes not found * Improve InMemoryHttpService * Add Mockito.meq and Mockito.eqManifest helpers * Allow FinatraObjectMapper.writePrettyString to handle strings containing json * Add FinatraJacksonModule config helpers * Allow JsonDiff to gracefully handle non*json comparisons * future.toOption and future.toBoolean should use NonFatal matcher
